import React, {useState} from 'react'; export const SignIn = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ username : '', password: '' }) const changeHandler = e => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const login = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(form) const urlLogin = 'http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login' const header = { method : 'POST', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept' : 'application/json', } const res = await fetch( ) } return (
